name: SyneSEIGEia
description:
This game was made in under a week for a game jam in which the theme was Synesthesia.

Synesthesia is a condition in which one sense (for example, hearing) is simultaneously perceived as if by one or more additional senses such as sight. Another form of synesthesia joins objects such as letters, shapes, numbers or people's names with a sensory perception such as smell, color or flavor.

More info on Synesthesia

This game uses the concept that some people with synesthesia see letters associated with specific colours (for example: A = Red, B = Blue, C = Yellow). Although some will associate different colours to others,  there are most common colours experienced by English speaking synaesthetes. This is what I have used to colour-code the letter keys.

In theory if you have synesthesia then this game should be easy!
